recipe_name: Beetroot, goats' cheese and walnut salad
author: Brian Turner
method: For the salad, place the beetroot, goats' cheese, green beans and walnuts into a large bowl and mix well.  Place the parsley onto a serving plate and top with the beetroot mixture. For the dressing, place all the dressing ingredients into a bowl and mix well. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad.
ingredients: 2 ready-cooked beetroot, chopped,  50g/1¾oz goats' cheese, crumbled,  50g/1¾oz green beans, cooked, drained,  1 tbsp chopped walnuts ,  handful fresh parsley,  1 tsp Dijon mustard,  1 tsp white wine vinegar,  3 tsp olive oil,  1 tsp goats' yoghurt,  50g/1¾oz goats' cheese, crumbled
